page.name: Bare Metal Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Bare Metal Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Bare Metal Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Bare Metal Cloud's service status notifications.

The services are once again in nominal operation.
